name: morning-sun
effect: Heals the user for half its max HP. During sunny day, the healing is increased to 2/3 max HP. During hail, rain dance, or sandstorm, the healing is decreased to 1/4 max HP.
short_effect: Heals the user by half its max HP. Affected by weather.

flavor_text.sword-shield: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
flavor_text.legends-arceus: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.
